position: Unity Developer – TER (Research and Study Project)
company: Faculté des Sciences Jean Perrin (University of Artois)
description: Development of a Point & Click game editor in a team of three, as part of a Master's degree project to become familiar with Unity.

company: Les Amis de Mandela – AFERTES, Avion
description: Developed an Android application connected to a website to register and manage outreach operations in the region. Also participated in the association’s and school’s activities to support people with disabilities and/or in precarious situations. Contributed to administrative tasks by interacting with partners and local/regional stakeholders.

position: iOS Development Intern – LML (Mathematics Laboratory of Lens)
description: Developed an iOS application to record individuals walking and store their movement data in JSON format. The app and a web platform allow movement visualization. The goal is to assist in diagnosing hydrocephalus, a neurodegenerative disease, by analyzing patient steps data, which will later be used to train a machine learning model.
Maintained the city's green spaces and public gardens.
